shortdesc.ph: Sets the size of the SDK log file.

dlentry.dd: This method is deprecated. Use the logConfig parameter in to set the log file size instead.
This method is deprecated. Set the log file size using the logConfig parameter in .

section.p:
By default, the SDK generates five SDK log files and five API call log files, as follows:
SDK log files: agorasdk.log, agorasdk.1.log, agorasdk.2.log, agorasdk.3.log, and agorasdk.4.log.
API call log files: agoraapi.log, agoraapi.1.log, agoraapi.2.log, agoraapi.3.log, and agoraapi.4.log.
Each log file has a default size of 2,048 KB and uses UTF-8 encoding.
The SDK writes the latest logs to agorasdk.log or agoraapi.log.
When agorasdk.log is full, the SDK handles the log files in the following order:
Delete agorasdk.4.log (if it exists).
Rename agorasdk.3.log to agorasdk.4.log.
Rename agorasdk.2.log to agorasdk.3.log.
Rename agorasdk.1.log to agorasdk.2.log.
Create a new agorasdk.log file.
The rotation rule for agoraapi.log is the same as for agorasdk.log.

section.note: This method only sets the size of the agorasdk.log file and does not affect the agoraapi.log file.

plentry.pd: The size of the agorasdk.log file in KB. The valid range is [128, 20480]. The default value is 2,048 KB. If the value is less than 128 KB, the SDK automatically adjusts it to 128 KB; if the value is greater than 20,480 KB, the SDK adjusts it to 20,480 KB.

The size of the agorasdk.log file in KB. Range: [128, 20480], default is 2,048 KB.
If the value is less than 128 KB, the SDK automatically adjusts it to 128 KB.
If the value is greater than 20,480 KB, the SDK automatically adjusts it to 20,480 KB.
